title: 应该是ess和iConomy的一个兼容问题
author: 梅梅梅梅子
txt_content:
[06:23:10 INFO]: [Essentials] Lag Notice - Slow Economy Response - Request took over 217.296ms!
[06:25:06 INFO]: [Essentials] Lag Notice - Slow Economy Response - Request took over 224.523ms!
[06:26:04 INFO]: [Essentials] Lag Notice - Slow Economy Response - Request took over 241.084ms!
[06:27:04 INFO]: [Essentials] Lag Notice - Slow Economy Response - Request took over 25.945ms!复制代码后台一直在刷类似的消息

iConomy连接了mysql

求一个解决办法，或者关闭这个提示的方法

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
你可以忽略此消息的

此消息是想提示你延迟略大

replies.author: 梅梅梅梅子
replies.txt_content:
XJue_DaDa 发表于 2017-8-17 08:07
你可以忽略此消息的

此消息是想提示你延迟略大
